entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Web App template includes icon-192.png file that doesn't appear to be used #49129
  • Unquarantine CompletionProvider tests after Roslyn upgrade #49126
    8.0
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49125
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #49124
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter, single_query #49123
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49122
  • On refresh of blazor webpage it loads forever. #49121
  • AOT build error during publish build in Blazor Wasm #49120
  • Add debugging when running in WSL for Blazor WebAssembly #49119
  • Installation of ASP.NET Core Runtime 6.0.9 Hosting bundle fails when the system is already installed with 6.0.14 #49116
  • [Blazor] Enhanced navigation does not display 4xx errors #49115
  • Hot reload failing on every change #49112
  • Results / TypedResults ignore null values #49107
  • Running fine on RHEL 8 about half an hour then got "The LDAP server is unavailable." exception. #49105
  • Design proposal: solution for cascading values into interactive pages #49104

Closed

  • Quarantine WebAssemblyICUShardingTests #49127
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #49089
  • Hot Reload unavailable #47836
  • Terrible performance from repeated non-incremental calls to static web assets targets #49097
  • Post SendAsync() doesn't return anything (Blazor WASM) #49102
  • Perf regression: json #49090
  • When using signalr in React.js, it does not enter the onclose method and does not working stable #48614

PullRequests

Created

  • Use SearchValues in PathString #49117
    area-runtime
  • Use SearchValues in HostString #49114
    area-runtime
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ec4fed9` to `251e720` #49110
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add support for antiforgery #49108
    area-blazor
  • Change AddServerSideBlazor to call services.AddRazorComponents().AddServerComponents() #49106
    area-blazor
  • Fix endpoints not being available in debug view until after WebApplication starts #49103
    area-hosting

Merged

  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • Set Hot Reload controlling headers DOTNET-MODIFIABLE-ASSEMBLIES and A… #48953
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #49034
    area-infrastructure
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Fix F# MVC template #48600
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add public metadata types. #49068
    area-runtime
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48969
    area-mvc, area-blazor
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm
  • Bug hash routing same page with params or query #48994
    area-blazor
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #49022
    area-infrastructure
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure
  • Add WithOrder to IEndpointConventionBuilder #49093
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Backport 48892 to 6.0 #48914
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Backport pr 48892 to 7.0 #48911
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
